headline.0: It's Time to Legalize Abortion in Chile and Everywhere Else

short_description.0: A shocking new ad campaign in Chile is telling women if they want to have an abortion, they should consider falling from the top of a staircase. That's because right now in Chile, it's illegal to end a pregnancy regardless of the circumstances.

authors.0: Steve Siebold, ContributorAuthor and expert in the field of critical thinking and mental...
